General.Name: Advanced Wireless Semiconductor Co
General.Description: Advanced Wireless Semiconductor Company provides foundry services in Taiwan. The company offers InGaP/GaAs HBT process for power amplifier and gain block circuit designs; GaAs E/D pHEMT process for switch and low noise amplifier designs; and ED BiHEMT technology for level integration single-chip designs in smart phone and WiFi applications. It also provides HBT, ED pHEMT, ED BiHEMT, IPD, bump for RF/wireless, and VCSEL/optical services. The company was founded in 1998 and is based in Tainan City, Taiwan.
General.Address: No.6, Da-Li 1st Road, Tainan City, Taiwan, 74145
